Addon.name: jQuery ajaxFileUpload
jQueryAjaxFileUpload test form
Addon.CopyText:
This input element will be saved to your user image when you hit upload

wait... loading
Upload Now

Scripting.Code: function m dim cs,error,filename,msg error="" msg="" filename=cp.request.getText("fileToUploadName") if filename="" then error="no file uploaded" else set cs = cp.csNew() if cs.open( "people", "id=" & cp.user.id ) then call cs.setFormInput("imageFilename","fileToUploadName") msg = "file:" & filename else error="user not found" end if call cs.close() end if m="{error:'" & error& "',msg:'" & msg & "'}" end function

Addon.name: jQuery Form Validator
Addon.Help:
jQuery Form Validator


/*
 * Inline Form Validation Engine 2.2.4, jQuery plugin
 *
 * Copyright(c) 2010, Cedric Dugas
 * http://www.position-absolute.com
 *
 * 2.0 Rewrite by Olivier Refalo
 * http://www.crionics.com
 *
 * Form validation engine allowing custom regex rules to be added.
 * Licensed under the MIT License
 */


Include this addon and give your form the id="jQueryValidate"


Validation rules are created as class attributes in each form element. This is the reference:


http://www.position-absolute.com/articles/jquery-form-validator-because-form-validation-is-a-mess/


some examples:

class="validate[required]" - makes the field required

class="validate[custom[integer]]" - integer required

class="validate[custom[email]]" - email required

Addon.name: jQuery Validator-jQueryValidator.org
jQuery BlockUI
